name: abc
content:
Samburu governor rejects food donation

Added on August 22nd, 2014

Samburu county governor Moses Lenolkulal has rejected 5,000 bags of maize sent to the county to alleviate hunger . The governor says the maize from maralal national cereals and produce board is unfit for human consumption . The governor says the maize is discolured and heavily infested by insects . The governor now wants the national cereals and produce board to immediately replace the bags of maize so that the affected locals can be supplied with food following the worsening hunger affecting the area.
